actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Distracting Swoop
special_abilities.desc: If the lymarien moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be distracted until the end of its next turn. A distracted creature has disadvantage on its next attack roll or ability check.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts
special_abilities.desc: The lymarien can communicate with beasts as if they shared a language.
